lines.name: The Onyx Village
lines.description:
Do NOT go here. 
And if you somehow end up here by accident,
DO NOT EAT THE FOOD

At first seems a strange reflection of the Cimmerian Market. 
You may think you've just gotten turned around and ended up back there.
Don't make this mistake.
